statements: UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET amount_raised = 5000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET funding_goal = 10000.00, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_name = 'Holiday Fundraiser';
UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET amount_raised = amount_raised + 1000 WHERE campaign_id = 1
UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET end_date = '2022-12-31', funding_goal = 50000.75 WHERE campaign_name = 'Winter Gala'
UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Donations SET donation_amount = 500.00 WHERE donation_id = 101;
UPDATE Campaigns SET end_date = '2022-12-31', campaign_name = 'Year-End Campaign' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Donations SET donation_amount = 5000.00, donor_name = 'Anonymous Donor', donation_date = '2022-11-30' WHERE donation_id = 101;
UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET total_amount_raised = total_amount_raised + 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 1
UPDATE Donors SET address = '123 Main Street' WHERE donor_id = 5
UPDATE FundraisingCampaigns SET total_amount_raised = total_amount_raised + 5000, total_donors = total_donors + 10 WHERE campaign_id = 101
UPDATE Donors SET email = 'newemail@example.com', address = 'New Address' WHERE donor_id = 201
UPDATE Campaigns SET total_funds_raised = 5000.00 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Donations SET donation_amount = 1000.00, donation_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE donation_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET total_funds_raised = total_funds_raised + 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Donors SET donation_amount = 1000, donation_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE donor_id = 3;
UPDATE Campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', budget = 5000.50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE Reports SET report_date = '2022-02-15', total_donations = 7500.75 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget = 15000.00, start_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
